subject: Re: Yakking swords

<smart aleck mode on>

If I had a sword that talked to me, I'd sell it or melt it down. Sheesh, 
how obnoxious, like the cars the tell you "your door is a jar!". No, 
it's still a door. Imagine, "That last blow was high and to the left", 
"No style!" or "I'm not a golf club you know!".

Rings however....

<smart aleck mode off>

Jim
